text: Table tennis was contested at the 2007 Parapan American Games from August 13 to 18 at the Riocentro in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. ==Participating nations== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Medal table== Brazil topped the medal table with a total of 26 medals. {| class="wikitable" border="solid 1px #AAAAAA" |- |style="background:#ccccff; width:1.5em;" | |Host nation |} ==Medalists== ===Men's=== ====Individual==== {|class=wikitable |- !Class !width=220 style="background:gold;"|Gold !width=200 style="background:silver;"|Silver !width=200 style="background:#CC9966;"|Bronze |- | C1 | | | |- | C2 | | | |- | C3 | | | |- | C4-5 | | | |- | C6 | | | |- | C7 | | | |- | C8 | | | |- | C9-10 | | | |} ====Team==== {|class=wikitable |- !Class !width=220 style="background:gold;"|Gold !width=200 style="background:silver;"|Silver !width=200 style="background:#CC9966;"|Bronze |- | C1-2 | Iranildo Espíndola Francisco Sales Hemerson Kovalski | Yunier Fernández Isbel Trujillo Yero | Jiovanny Rojas Jesus Tirado |- | C3 | Jocerlei Silva Luiz Algacir da Silva Welder Knaf | Eduardo Sánchez Erasmo Vega Jesús Sánchez | Edson Gomez Roberto Quijada |- | C4 | Ecildo Lopez de Oliveira Alexandre Ank Ivanildo Freitas | León Coronado Jesus Salgueiro | Rafael Cristancho Esteban Guzman |- | C5 | Roberto Alves Claudiomiro Segatto | Andre Scott Stuart Caplan | Ricardo Perdiguero Luis Ferreyra Daniel Rodriguez |- | C6-7 | Mitchell Seidenfeld Norman Bass Edward Levy | Carlo di Franco Cristovan Lima Luiz Medina | Gerardo Moncada G. Domingo Arguello |- | C8 | Tahl Leibovitz Wayne Lo | Ian Kent Masoud Mojtahed | Francisco Melo João Nascimento Jr. |- | C9-10 | Antônio Mello Edmilson Pinheiro Alexandre Caldeira Willian Almeida | José Luis Vivanco René Domínguez | Martin Pelletier Réal Poudrier |} ====Open==== {|class=wikitable |- !Class !width=220 style="background:gold;"|Gold !width=200 style="background:silver;"|Silver !width=200 style="background:#CC9966;"|Bronze |- | C1-5 | | | |- | C6-10 | | | |} ===Women's=== ====Individual==== {|class=wikitable |- !Class !width=220 style="background:gold;"|Gold !width=200 style="background:silver;"|Silver !width=200 style="background:#CC9966;"|Bronze |- | C1-3 | | | |- | C4-5 | | | |- | C6-8 | | | |} ====Team==== {|class=wikitable |- !Class !width=220 style="background:gold;"|Gold !width=200 style="background:silver;"|Silver !width=200 style="background:#CC9966;"|Bronze |- | C1-3 | Yanelis Silva Zamora Pastora Hernández | Edith Sigala Alma Padilla | Carla Azevedo Rosângela Dalcim |- | C4-5 | Maria Paredes Teresa Arenales | Noga Nir-Kistler Pamela Fontaine | Maria Passos Sônia Oliveira Joyce Oliveira |} ====Open==== {|class=wikitable |- !Class !width=220 style="background:gold;"|Gold !width=200 style="background:silver;"|Silver !width=200 style="background:#CC9966;"|Bronze |- | C1-5 | | | |- | C6-10 | | | |} ==References== Category: Events at the 2007 Parapan American Games Category: 2007 in table tennis Category: Table tennis at multi-sport events
title: Table tennis at the 2007 Parapan American Games
